page.title: 10SURVEY OF 30 HOUSES/BURGHILL
page.content: This survey of 30 houses in the Burghill/Tillington area which are connected to the school. It shows the percentage of different types of building and facilities. BUNGALOWS 6.67% DETATCHED HOUSES 50.00% SEMI-DETATCHED HOUSES 43.33% 2 BEDROOMS 13.33% 3 BEDROOMS 70.00% 4 BEDROOMS 13.33% 5 BEDROOMS 3.33% 63.33% were owner-occupied and 36.67% were tenanted. AGE OF HOUSES IN SURVERY 20 years old 33.34% 20 to 100 years old 43.34% 100 years or over 23.34% PRINCIPAL BUILDING MATERIAL USED BRICK 80.00% TIMBER 16.67% STONE 3.33%
